xwikidoc.name: PrepareTranslationsSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: PrepareTranslationsSheet
xwikidoc.content: #** * This page creates all the empty translations for a language that does not exist in this language but exist in english * @type sheet *# #if($request.language) #set($trans = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("L10NCode.L10NGroovy")) $trans.setContext($context, $xwiki) Preparing translations: $trans.prepareTranslations($doc.web, "core", $request.language) #else Select language to prepare translations for: [fr>$doc.fullName?language=fr] [de>$doc.fullName?language=de] [es>$doc.fullName?language=es] #end
